allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix pack page routing: add /p/ prefix and fix name sanitization

- Route changed from /packId/ to /p/packId/
- sanitizeName now properly removes Minecraft color codes \(禮b -> removed, not b\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git add dist/p/ dist/data/ dist/thumbnails/ dist/assets/ src/ scripts/)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix pack page routing and name sanitization

- Use absolute paths in pack-detail.js for /p/ subdirectory
- Fix sanitizeName\(\) to trim before replacing spaces \(removes leading underscores\)
- Clean up old data files

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move dist contents to root for GitHub Pages

- Remove dist/ directory, output directly to root
- Update all scripts to use root paths instead of dist/

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix pack.html paths: use absolute paths for /p/ subdirectory

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix card aspect ratio to match cover.png \(2:1\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add steak and golden_carrot textures with fallback paths

- Support alternative texture names \(beef_cooked, carrot_golden\)
- Fix cover.png to show all 8 textures

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Use Default_Texture as fallback for missing textures

- Move pack.png reference to Default_Texture/pack.png
- Fallback to Default_Texture for any missing item/block textures

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update pack detail page layout and preview grid

- Pack.png on left, display name + original name + file size on right
- Replace TEXTURES with Preview section
- Two-column layout for desktop, single column for mobile
- Add cobblestone.png to extracted textures

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enlarge armor/icons/particles images in preview grid

- Armor images span 1 column each \(2 per row\)
- Icons and particles span full width \(2 columns\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 3D armor viewer using three.js

- Replace armor texture images with interactive 3D model
- Use Steve.png as base skin with diamond armor overlay
- Model rotates automatically for preview

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for f in p/eum3edit/index.html p/Jewdah_Private/index.html p/Eum3Blue_Revamp/index.html p/Xenon_16x/index.html)
Bash(git commit -m "Use skinview3d for armor viewer")
Bash(git add scripts/extract-textures.js src/css/style.css src/js/pack-detail.js assets/css/style.css assets/js/pack-detail.js thumbnails/*/buff_fire_resistance.png)
